titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 88) to modify the boundary of the Shiloh National Military Park located in Tennessee and Mississippi, to establish Parker's Crossroads Battlefield as an affiliated area of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 88) to modify the boundary of the Shiloh National Military Park located in Tennessee and Mississippi, to establish Parker's Crossroads Battlefield as an affiliated area of the National Park System, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-1054, by Mr. Sessions.
Rule provides for consideration of Senate amendment to H.R. 88 with 1 hour of general debate.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 195.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1160.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H.Res. 1160, the Chair put the question on agreeing to the resolution, and by voice vote, announced that the ayes had prevailed. Mr. McGovern demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on agreeing to the resolution until a time to be announced.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 181 (Roll no. 423).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 88) to modify the boundary of the Shiloh National Military Park located in Tennessee and Mississippi, to establish Parker's Crossroads Battlefield as an affiliated area of the National Park System.
